title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the limits and constant

2 points are earned for integrand

<-1> each error

1 point is earned for the answer

Volume=π ∫ 0 1 ( ( 2−g( x ) ) 2 − ( 2−f( x ) ) 2 ) dx =π ∫ 0 1 ( ( 2−3( x−1 ) x ) 2 − ( 2−2x( 1−x ) ) 2 )dx =16.179 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@79F1@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:

Volume= ∫ 0 1 ( h( x )−g( x ) ) 2 dx ∫ 0 1 ( kx( 1−x )−3( x−1 ) x ) 2 dx=15 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@63E7@
